title: Easy 24 Hour Thick Bleach 12x 750ml | 99.9% Toilet Cleaner Bleach For Bathrooms, Toilets, Sinks | Anti Bacterial
features: Powerful Cleaning Formula – Our thick bleach provides long-lasting protection against germs, leaving your home sparkling clean and hygienic.
Kills 99.9% of Germs and Bacteria – Effectively eliminates harmful bacteria, viruses, and fungi, providing a safer environment for your family.
Multipurpose Cleaner – Perfect for use in kitchens, bathrooms, toilets, and floors, ensuring every surface is thoroughly disinfected.
Long-Lasting Thick Gel – The thick consistency allows the bleach to cling to surfaces for a longer time, ensuring deep cleaning and stain removal.
12-Pack for Value and Convenience – Get 12 bottles of 750ml thick bleach, offering unbeatable value for money and ensuring you're always stocked up.
Effective Stain Removal – Easily removes tough stains like mold, mildew, and limescale, leaving surfaces bright and fresh.
Ideal for Hard Water Areas – Specially formulated to combat limescale and mineral deposits, ensuring excellent results in areas with hard water.
Fresh Scent – Enjoy a clean, fresh-smelling home after every use, with minimal bleach odor.
Easy-to-Pour Bottle – Designed with a convenient spout for controlled application and minimal spills, making cleaning hassle-free.
Trusted Brand – Manufactured to high-quality standards for superior cleaning performance, trusted by households for years.
description: Product Description Serious clean. Effortless confidence. Give every room the flawless shine you can see—and trust. Each 750 ml bottle of easy Seriously Thick Bleach delivers a rich gel that stays where you apply it, breaking down dirt while eliminating 99.9 % of germs.* Packaged in a handy 12-bottle case, it keeps your cupboard ready for action all year.Why easy outperforms ordinary bleach Brilliantly protective: The advanced formula wipes out 99.9 % of common bacteria, viruses and fungi, leaving lasting defence for your family.* Pure, powerful thickness: Our extra-dense gel hugs rims, grout and tiles, working deeper and longer for spotless results—no drips, no waste. Multisurface mastery: Countertops, sinks, toilets, floors—even outdoor stains—one bottle handles them all with professional-grade precision. Stain eraser: Say goodbye to mould, mildew, limescale and mineral build-up. easy restores the bright look you forgot was there. Hard-water hero: Specially tuned for hard-water areas, the formula tackles mineral deposits before they take hold. Fresh-air finish: A crisp scent replaces the typical bleach smell, so the only thing lingering is the shine.Clean made seriously easy. Grab your easy Seriously Thick Bleach 12-Bottle Case today—because the future of hygiene should be simple. *Lab-tested on common household germs. Always read the label and follow usage instructions.o3 What makes easy Seriously Thick Bleach “seriously” thick? Engineered with a high-viscosity gel that clings to vertical and hard-to-reach areas—like under toilet rims and grout lines—so it works longer and penetrates deeper before you rinse. Does it really kill 99.9 % of germs? Yes. Independent lab tests confirm it eliminates 99.9 % of common bacteria, viruses and fungi when used as directed, giving you hospital-grade hygiene at home. Can I use it in a hard-water area? Absolutely. The formula includes water-softening agents that break down limescale and mineral deposits, so you still get a sparkling, streak-free finish. Will it damage coloured fabrics or grout? It’s a powerful bleach, so keep it away from coloured fabrics and unsealed grout. For colour-safe cleaning, spot-test an inconspicuous area first. How long should I leave it on a surface? For everyday disinfection, allow 3–5 minutes before rinsing. For heavy stains (mould, mildew, limescale), leave up to 15 minutes for maximum effect.
